things.name: weather_builtin_big_thing
things.description: A device designed to gather and report data on various weather conditions, including humidity, pressure, and temperature.

functions.name: humid
functions.description: Retrieves the current humidity level as a percentage.

functions.name: pressure
functions.description: Measures the current atmospheric pressure in millibars.

functions.name: temp
functions.description: Reports the current temperature in degrees Celsius.

functions.name: weather
functions.description: Provides a brief textual summary of current weather conditions.

functions.name: weather_info
functions.description: Gives detailed weather information based on specified latitude and longitude.

things.name: operation_builtin_big_thing
things.description: A generic computational device capable of performing basic arithmetic operations and string concatenation.

functions.name: add
functions.description: Performs addition between two numbers and returns the result.

functions.name: concat
functions.description: Concatenates two strings and returns the combined result.

functions.name: div
functions.description: Divides the first number by the second and returns the quotient.

functions.name: mod
functions.description: Calculates the remainder of the division of the first number by the second.

functions.name: mul
functions.description: Multiplies two numbers and returns the product.

functions.name: sub
functions.description: Subtracts the second number from the first and returns the difference.

things.name: clock_builtin_big_thing
things.description: Provides various time-related data, such as current date, time, and Unix time.

values.name: date_double
values.description: Represents the current date in a double format YYYYMMDD.

values.name: datetime
values.description: Shows the current date in a string format YYYY/MM/DD.

values.name: datetime_double
values.description: Displays the current date and time in a double format YYYYMMDDHHMM.

values.name: day
values.description: Indicates the current day of the month.

values.name: hour
values.description: Shows the current hour of the day in a 24-hour format.

values.name: minute
values.description: Displays the current minute of the hour.

values.name: month
values.description: Represents the current month as an integer.

values.name: second
values.description: Shows the current second of the minute.

values.name: time
values.description: Provides the current time in a string format HH:MM:SS.

values.name: time_double
values.description: Shows the current time in a double format HHMM.

values.name: unix_time
values.description: The number of seconds that have elapsed since January 1, 1970 (midnight UTC/GMT), not counting leap seconds (in POSIX time).

values.name: weekday
values.description: Returns the day of the week as a string.

values.name: year
values.description: Displays the current year as an integer.

things.name: ContactSensor
things.description: A sensor designed to detect and report the open or closed status of a contact point, typically used for doors or windows.

values.name: contact
values.description: Indicates whether the contact point is open or closed.

things.name: AirConditioner
things.description: A smart air conditioning unit that can be controlled to adjust room temperature, switch on/off, and set operational modes.

values.name: airConditionerMode
values.description: Specifies the current operational mode of the air conditioner, such as 'heat', 'cool', or 'auto'.

values.name: switch
values.description: Controls the power state of the air conditioner, allowing it to be turned on or off.

functions.name: off
functions.description: Turns off the air conditioner.

functions.name: on
functions.description: Turns on the air conditioner.

functions.name: setAirConditionerMode
functions.description: Sets the operational mode of the air conditioner to a specified mode such as 'heat', 'cool', or 'auto'.

things.name: HumiditySensor
things.description: A sensor that measures and reports the relative humidity in the air, providing data essential for various climate control systems.

values.name: humidity
values.description: Reports the current relative humidity as a percentage.

things.name: Pump
things.description: A device capable of controlling fluid flow, equipped with features for turning on/off and adjusting operational modes.

values.name: operationMode
values.description: Determines the pump's current operational mode, such as 'minimum', 'maximum', or 'auto'.

values.name: switch
values.description: Controls the power state of the pump, allowing it to be turned on or off.

functions.name: off
functions.description: Turns off the pump.

functions.name: on
functions.description: Turns on the pump.

functions.name: setOperationMode
functions.description: Sets the operational mode of the pump to a specified mode such as 'minimum', 'maximum', or 'auto'.

things.name: Button
things.description: A simple input device designed to detect physical presses, commonly used to trigger actions or commands in a system.

values.name: button
values.description: Represents the current state of the button, such as 'pressed' or 'released'.

things.name: Light
things.description: A smart lighting device that can adjust its state, color, and brightness levels, offering customizable lighting conditions.

values.name: color
values.description: Specifies the current color of the light in RGB format.

values.name: level
values.description: Controls the brightness level of the light, with values ranging from 0 (off) to 100 (full brightness).

values.name: switch
values.description: Indicates whether the light is turned on or off.

functions.name: off
functions.description: Turns the light off.

functions.name: on
functions.description: Turns the light on.

functions.name: setColor
functions.description: Changes the color of the light to a specified RGB value.

functions.name: setLevel
functions.description: Adjusts the brightness level of the light from 0 (off) to 100 (full brightness).

things.name: SoundSensor
things.description: A device that detects sound levels in the environment, typically used for security or noise monitoring applications.

values.name: sound
values.description: Indicates the presence of sound, with possible values like 'detected' or 'not detected'.

things.name: MotionSensor
things.description: A sensor that detects physical movement within its vicinity, commonly used in security and automation systems.

values.name: motion
values.description: Reports the detection of motion, with values such as 'active' or 'inactive'.

things.name: Camera
things.description: A smart camera device capable of capturing and streaming video, equipped with features for remote control and image capture.

values.name: image
values.description: Stores the last captured image or video frame.

values.name: switch
values.description: Controls the power state of the camera, allowing it to be turned on or off for privacy or power saving.

functions.name: off
functions.description: Turns off the camera.

functions.name: on
functions.description: Turns on the camera.

functions.name: take
functions.description: Captures an image or video frame and stores it.

things.name: LightSensor
things.description: A sensor that measures the intensity of ambient light. Commonly used in systems that require adaptive lighting conditions.

values.name: light
values.description: Reports the measured light intensity in lux.

things.name: PresenceSensor
things.description: Detects the presence of individuals in an area, used for security, automation, and energy management applications.

values.name: presence
values.description: Indicates whether someone is present in the sensor's vicinity, with values like 'present' or 'absent'.

things.name: Shade
things.description: A device used to control window shades, adjusting the amount of light entering a room.

values.name: shadeLevel
values.description: Controls the position of the shade, with 0 representing fully closed and 100 fully open.

values.name: switch
values.description: Indicates whether the shade is enabled or disabled.

functions.name: off
functions.description: Disables the shade, preventing it from being adjusted.

functions.name: on
functions.description: Enables the shade, allowing it to be adjusted.

functions.name: setShadeLevel
functions.description: Sets the position of the shade to a specified level, with 0 being fully closed and 100 fully open.

things.name: AirPurifier
things.description: An IoT device designed to improve indoor air quality by removing contaminants and allergens from the air.

values.name: airPurifierFanMode
values.description: Specifies the fan speed of the air purifier, such as 'low', 'medium', 'high', or 'auto'.

values.name: switch
values.description: Controls the power state of the air purifier, allowing it to be turned on or off.

functions.name: off
functions.description: Turns off the air purifier.

functions.name: on
functions.description: Turns on the air purifier.

functions.name: setAirPurifierFanMode
functions.description: Adjusts the fan speed of the air purifier to a specified mode such as 'low', 'medium', 'high', or 'auto'.

things.name: WaterValve
things.description: Controls the flow of water through a valve, allowing for automated management of irrigation systems or water supply.

values.name: switch
values.description: Indicates the operational state of the valve, either 'on' for open or 'off' for closed, controlling water flow.

values.name: valve
values.description: Provides the current status of the valve, 'open' allowing water to pass through or 'closed' to stop the flow.

functions.name: close
functions.description: Closes the valve, stopping water flow.

functions.name: off
functions.description: Turns off the valve, effectively closing it if it was open.

functions.name: on
functions.description: Turns on the valve, allowing water to flow through.

functions.name: open
functions.description: Opens the valve to start water flow.

things.name: Television
things.description: A smart TV device that supports various channels and volume adjustments, along with mute and power controls.

values.name: channel
values.description: Represents the current channel number the TV is tuned to.

values.name: mute
values.description: Indicates whether the TV's sound is muted.

values.name: switch
values.description: Controls the power state of the TV, allowing it to be turned on or off.

values.name: volume
values.description: Adjusts the TV's volume level, with 0 being silent and increasing values for louder audio.

functions.name: channelDown
functions.description: Decreases the TV channel by one.

functions.name: channelUp
functions.description: Increases the TV channel by one.

functions.name: mute
functions.description: Toggles the mute state of the TV, muting or unmuting the sound.

functions.name: off
functions.description: Turns off the TV, powering it down.

functions.name: on
functions.description: Turns on the TV, powering it up.

functions.name: setTvChannel
functions.description: Sets the TV to a specific channel.

functions.name: setVolume
functions.description: Adjusts the TV's volume to a specified level.

functions.name: volumeDown
functions.description: Decreases the TV's volume by a small increment.

functions.name: volumeUp
functions.description: Increases the TV's volume by a small increment.

things.name: TempSensor
things.description: Measures and reports the ambient temperature of its environment, useful for climate control and monitoring applications.

values.name: temperature
values.description: The current temperature reading from the sensor, measured in degrees Celsius.

things.name: Speaker
things.description: A smart speaker device capable of playing audio content, with features for volume control and audio source selection.

values.name: volume
values.description: Adjusts the speaker's volume level, with 0 being silent and increasing values for louder audio.

functions.name: decreaseVolume
functions.description: Lowers the speaker's volume by a set increment.

functions.name: increaseVolume
functions.description: Raises the speaker's volume by a set increment.

functions.name: mute
functions.description: Mutes the speaker, stopping all audio output.

functions.name: setVolume
functions.description: Sets the speaker's volume to a specified level.

functions.name: unmute
functions.description: Unmutes the speaker, resuming audio output.
